page.title: 04SMUGGLER'S RESTAURANT
page.content: I get up at 7.30am.By 8.30,I unlock, switch off the burglar alarm,check the bookings that have come in the morning post with the Bookings Diary,and quickly write out the replies.Peter the chef arrives just after 9am,and between us we put together the food orders and discuss menus required by different parties that have written requesting them.During the early part of the morning I restock the wine racks and the bar,boxing up all the empty bottles that are charged for return.On the busy days,the telephone can ring 30-40 times during the morning with bookings for tables of 2-22.The staff arrive from 10.30am. Apart from the chef,there is one full-time assistant chef and two part-time students.In the restaurant, there are two full-time waiters and three part-time waitresses(cont.p5)
